
Update report of Norman Thunderbyte NVCLEAN Virus Cleaner
    Prefixes:
    '-'     indicates a change that does not require user attention.
    '->'    indicates a modification that requires user attention, such as a
            change in program invocation, etc.


   -> NVCLEAN now supports boot virus cleaning for FAT32 
      (OSR2 under Windows 95). After a cleaning operation, NVCLEAN 
      will quit without changing any files. 

   -> NVCLEAN does not support macro virus removal any more.
